examples.example: 我用这支精美的钢笔写下了对未来美好的憧憬。

translate.english: I used this exquisite pen to write down the beautiful vision for the future.

examples.example: 我拿起心爱的钢笔，在纸上流畅地书写着心中的喜悦。

translate.english: I picked up my beloved fountain pen and smoothly wrote the joy in my heart on the paper.

examples.example: 我用那支珍贵的钢笔记录下生活中点点滴滴的幸福瞬间。

translate.english: I use that precious fountain pen to record every bit of happy moments in life.
